name: Gottlob's Loneliest Birthday
description:
“Today’s my birthday! Let’s go visit my friends Gotfrieb, Gotnovb and Gotstar!

But where did they all go?”

Use your gravitational grappling hook to explore Deep Mines, the Crystal Cave and Foggy Skies and hopefully meet up with your friends!

Or just go back home and celebrate your birthday on your own...

Controls:

Arrow keys to move and jump

Space to use your grappling hook on the white targets

R to reset to the nearest checkpoint if you're stuck or if you encounter a nasty bug!

Features:

Incredible! Your grappling hook can change the direction of gravity!

Five different areas where you might find your friends

Backtrack your way through the environment

Hopefully have a birthday party?

Credits:

Art set Paper Pixels by VEXED

Music “Game Over” and “Fairytales” by Danijel Zambo, courtesy of Uppbeat (License codes: TPRCHJ1TIC4ZFYAX and UUQ1UR6PITKGVTSZ)

Sound effects made with Bfxr

Game made in 48h with Godot for the GMTK Game Jam 2021: “Joined Together”.
